time_test_exemption.description: Minimum holding period in years for tax exemption on capital gains
notes: Securities held for more than 3 years are exempt from capital gains tax
Time is calculated from purchase date to sale date (calendar-based)
Example: Buy 2021-01-15, Sell 2024-01-16 = EXEMPT (3 years + 1 day)
Leap years are handled automatically using calendar dates
time_test_exemption.legal_reference: Czech Income Tax Act ยง 4(1)(w)
